resources.string: Illuminate your path in the darkness
Navigate the shadows with clarity and confidence as the torch\'s glow leads your way.
This service uses light sensor to show whether user is in the dark or bright area. Application includes a feature of toggling flashlight.
Notifier of current intensity of light.
It seems you permanently declined %1$s permission. You can go to app settings to grant it.
This app needs notification permission so that it will notify you all the events.
